text: Phil Ponce (born 1949) is a Chicago television journalist who hosts Chicago Tonight, a nightly television magazine of news and culture on WTTW 11.Chicago Tonight: Who's Who. WTTW. Retrieved on October 5, 2010. Ponce grew up in East Chicago, Indiana. He graduated from Bishop Noll Institute in Hammond, Indiana. He then attended Indiana University and received a B.A. in English in 1971. He is married to Ann Ponce. They have three children. They live in Ravenswood, Chicago. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American television presenters Category:Journalists from Indiana Category:People from East Chicago, Indiana Category:Journalists from Chicago
